scripts.build: npx yarn compile && for dir_name in orbital-helper tcp-to-blob; do echo "building ${dir_name}"; npx yarn --cwd  ${dir_name} build; done
scripts.build-orbital-helper: npx yarn compile && yarn --cwd orbital-helper build
scripts.build-tcp-to-blob: npx yarn compile && yarn --cwd tcp-to-blob build
scripts.build-tools: npx yarn compile && yarn --cwd tools/orbital-helper-ui build
scripts.clean: rm -rf ./node_modules && for dir_name in common-js orbital-helper tcp-to-blob tools/orbital-helper-ui; do echo "cleaning ${dir_name}"; npx yarn --cwd  ${dir_name} clean; done
scripts.compile-tools: npx yarn compile-common-js && npx yarn compile-orbital-helper && npx yarn --cwd tools/orbital-helper-ui compile
scripts.compile: for dir_name in common-js orbital-helper tcp-to-blob; do echo "compiling ${dir_name}"; npx yarn --cwd  ${dir_name} compile; done
